BBEX3.M.RON.EUR.BB.AC.A02: Euro foreign exchange reference rate of the ECB / EUR 1 = RON ... / Romania / from July 2005

General: The ECB publishes daily euro foreign exchange reference rates, which are calculated on the basis of the concertation between central banks at 14.15. Currency conversion with effect from 1 July 2005: ROL 10,000 = RON 1. Up to June 2005, see BBEX3:M:ROL:EUR:BB:AC:A02.
Methodology: Averages: Bundesbank calculations based on the daily euro reference exchange rates published by the ECB.
